2. Data: it may be easier to show your data in a table. 
6. Preservation: please note that the KU Leuven RDM policy recommends 10 years of storage (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy). Storing data on a hard drive only is risky, since you have only a small volume storing the university servers could be a better solution? For more information see: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en or contact your local IT team. 
7. Sharing: Have you considered using a repository for data sharing? if there are no suitable domain specific repositories in your field you can use KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr)
label: good with suggestions
